name: Hafiz Zamani
story: Faisal was born and raised in a small village in Iran. He joined the military at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks due to his dedication and skill as a marksman. Despite his success, Faisal always remained humble and focused on his duties. He is highly respected by his fellow soldiers, who trust him to have their backs in any situation. Faisal's only regret is that he has not yet found a wife to share his life with, but he is confident that his mission will someday bring him the right partner.
